Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the True Comfort Skill and Alexa, you can interact with your FLEXTHERM Wi-Fi thermostats(FLP55).

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your True Comfort account and say, "Alexa, discover devices.” 

To define rooms:
- Create an Alexa group and add the device(s) to the group in the Alexa App. More information is available at http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups.
 
Thermostat Control:
- You can set the temperature to different values, for example: « Alexa, set kitchen temperature to 19 degrees » or « Alexa, make bedroom warmer .»

Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home.
